step_feedback.feedback: Great start! Focus on gently squeezing your shoulder blades back and down. Try to keep your elbows and wrists a bit more relaxed and in line with your shoulders.
Good movement! For the next repetitions, aim to bring your shoulders back and down more smoothly. Pay attention to keeping your elbows and wrists aligned with your shoulders as you roll.
You're doing well with the repetitions! Continue to focus on the circular motion, bringing your shoulders back and down. Try to keep your wrists and elbows closer to your body for better alignment.

exercise_summary: You're doing a good job with your shoulder rolls! Remember to gently squeeze your shoulder blades back and down in a smooth circle. Keep your elbows and wrists aligned with your shoulders for best results.
